news.title: Study Sees No Evidence Linking Diabetes Drugs With Pancreatic Cancer
news.summary: WEDNESDAY, Feb. 26, 2014 -- There's no firm evidence that the type 2 diabetes medications known as incretin-based drugs cause pancreatitis or pancreatic cancer, U.S. and European health officials say. But it's too early to say there's definitely no...

news.title: Incretin-Based Drugs, Pancreatic Safety
news.summary: Incretin-based drugs seem not to have a causal association with pancreatitis or pancreatic cancer.

wikipedia.title: Vildagliptin
wikipedia.summary: Vildagliptin has been shown to reduce hyperglycemia in type 2 diabetes mellitus.

wikipedia.title: Dipeptidyl peptidase-4 inhibitor
wikipedia.summary: Inhibitors of dipeptidyl peptidase 4, also DPP-4 inhibitors or gliptins, are a class of oral hypoglycemics that block DPP-4.

wikipedia.title: Liraglutide
wikipedia.summary: Liraglutide (NN2211), marketed under the brand name Victoza and Saxenda, is a long-acting glucagon-like peptide-1 agonist (GLP-1 agonist) injection developed by Novo Nordisk for the treatment of type 2 diabetes.

wikipedia.title: Saxagliptin
wikipedia.summary: Saxagliptin (rINN), previously identified as BMS-477118, is a new oral hypoglycemic (anti-diabetic drug) of the new dipeptidyl peptidase-4 (DPP-4) inhibitor class of drugs.

weibo.summary: 肠促胰素：主要由GLP-1和GIP组成。近期发表的一项研究显示，基于肠促胰素的治疗可能与胰腺癌的发病有关。然而，2014年美国FDA和EMA联合发表的声明却表示，胰腺癌发病风险的增加与目前已发表的数据结果回顾并不一致，认为基于肠促胰素的治疗是安全的。http://t.cn/RhBnS46
